Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.66200054 0.91325944 0.87780742 0.22189776 0.04045925 0.70813560
#>  [7] 0.86285803 0.98127755 0.08091466 0.29845961 0.39140541 0.25391432
#> [13] 0.60129791 0.93162111 0.79949678 0.56148082 0.98133187 0.64250478
#> [19] 0.70743259 0.05533155
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.38680873 0.10134795 0.30531036 0.14897664 0.03058155 0.92141054
#>  [7] 0.43688965 0.96271406 0.31495061 0.21184671 0.56180364 0.17569742
#> [13] 0.61994512 0.01487412 0.87971435 0.54689724 0.35393222 0.55658840
#> [19] 0.88708966 0.76657421

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.33399532 0.04959923 0.22048544 0.07326996 0.72710558 0.46514955
#>  [7] 0.06067159 0.74359265 0.59879913 0.67212934
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.4235663 0.7813031 0.5235480 0.3352884 0.2522753 0.1200629 0.2609537
#>  [8] 0.3803836 0.1162132 0.1561880
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.89824503 0.87254293 0.47155673 0.07189499 0.11209449 0.87318310
#>  [7] 0.31728179 0.76863922 0.66872568 0.87016523

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.2227727 0.8776885 0.1140901 0.5794004 0.5377209
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2585352 0.4967799 0.2256914 0.9498428 0.7999430
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.2680459 0.8356014 0.7986754 0.6895994 0.6776191
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.6721401 0.8236764 0.2882554 0.8437826 0.8964905

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.147593623 0.779354964 0.225666418 0.007311072 0.338403822
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.09527203 0.46574084 0.89398957 0.32988340 0.21022031
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9261571 0.6352605 0.3181441 0.7414364 0.1679512
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9430740 0.6857872 0.7772501 0.1162457 0.6645792

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.39033657 0.53232418 0.05901519 0.82573937 0.80401501
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.05025422 0.30687206 0.88839825 0.16804198 0.05833925
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8769516 0.9053136 0.6801639 0.9608705 0.4989819
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.97881854 0.67312061 0.74730646 0.09262771 0.86552887

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.2         3.6          6.1         2.5  virginica
#> 2          6.4         3.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          7.3         2.9          6.3         1.8  virginica
#> 4          5.6         2.9          3.6         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          6.3         2.8          5.1         1.5  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.3         2.9          6.3         1.8  virginica
#> 2          6.3         2.3          4.4         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 4          5.1         3.4          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 5          5.0         2.0          3.5         1.0 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.1         2.5          3.0         1.1 versicolor
#> 2          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1     setosa
#> 3          4.8         3.0          1.4         0.3     setosa
#> 4          6.4         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.4         2.8
#> 2           4.8         3.4
#> 3           5.0         3.5
#> 4           5.7         3.8
#> 5           5.8         2.7
#> 6           5.7         3.0
#> 7           5.0         3.4
#> 8           4.9         3.6
#> 9           7.6         3.0
#> 10          5.5         2.5
#> 11          6.0         2.7
#> 12          6.5         3.0
#> 13          4.4         3.0
#> 14          5.6         2.8
#> 15          5.4         3.4
#> 16          4.4         2.9
#> 17          5.5         2.6
#> 18          5.5         2.4
#> 19          6.7         2.5
#> 20          5.4         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.7         3.2
#> 2          5.6         2.9
#> 3          4.5         2.3
#> 4          4.8         3.1
#> 5          6.3         2.8
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.7         3.8
#> 2          6.6         3.0
#> 3          6.4         2.8
#> 4          4.7         3.2
#> 5          4.8         3.4
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.5         2.4
#> 2          4.7         3.2
#> 3          4.9         3.1
#> 4          5.7         4.4
#> 5          6.1         3.0
